name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender pieces of chicken marinated in a creamy tomato-based sauce with a blend of Indian spices, served with naan or rice. A beloved North Indian classic.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Fresh spinach cooked with cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a creamy tomato-based sauce, flavored with garlic, ginger, and aromatic spices. A nutritious and flavorful vegetarian dish.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with succulent pieces of chicken marinated in yogurt and a blend of spices, layered with caramelized onions and fresh herbs. A flavorful and aromatic rice dish loved across India.

name: Masala Dosa
description: A crispy South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, filled with a spiced potato mixture and served with coconut chutney and sambar (lentil soup). A beloved breakfast or snack option.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Chunks of paneer marinated in a spiced yogurt mixture, skewered with colorful bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes, and grilled or baked to perfection. A popular vegetarian appetizer or snack.

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with a medley of fresh vegetables, spices, and herbs, layered with caramelized onions and saffron-infused milk. A flavorful and satisfying vegetarian rice dish.

name: Aloo Gobi
description: A comforting North Indian dish made with potatoes (aloo) and cauliflower (gobi) cooked with onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and a blend of aromatic spices. A delicious vegetarian option.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender pieces of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce, flavored with garlic, ginger, and a blend of Indian spices. Served with naan or rice, it's a popular choice in Indian restaurants worldwide.

name: Pani Puri
description: A popular Indian street food snack consisting of hollow puri shells filled with a spicy and tangy mixture of tamarind chutney, flavored water (pani), boiled potatoes, chickpeas, and spices. Bursting with flavor and texture.

name: Rogan Josh
description: A fragrant Kashmiri dish featuring tender pieces of lamb cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy made with yogurt, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of Kashmiri spices. Served with rice or naan for a hearty meal.

name: Chole Bhature
description: A classic Punjabi dish consisting of spicy chickpea curry (chole) served with fluffy deep-fried bread (bhature). This indulgent combination is often enjoyed as a hearty breakfast or satisfying meal.

name: Matar Paneer
description: A flavorful North Indian curry made with peas (matar) and cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce with onions, garlic, ginger, and aromatic spices.

name: Dal Tadka
description: A comforting Indian lentil dish made with yellow lentils (dal) tempered with ghee, cumin seeds, garlic, and spices. Garnished with fresh cilantro, it's often served with rice or naan for a satisfying meal.

name: Samosa
description: A popular Indian snack consisting of crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and sometimes minced meat or lentils. These triangular delights are perfect for snacking or as appetizers.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft and spongy milk-based balls soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup flavored with rose water, cardamom, and saffron. A beloved Indian dessert often served warm or cold on special occasions.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: A popular Mumbai street food dish featuring a spicy mashed vegetable curry (bhaji) served with buttered and toasted bread rolls (pav). This flavorful and hearty dish is a favorite among locals and tourists alike.
